title: Balantak - Mark (Book)
description: Balantak translation of the Gospel of Mark. Balantak is an Austronesian language spoken at the head of the eastern peninsula of Sulawesi.

language.name: Balantak
language.area: East central Sulawesi, Banggai District, eastern peninsula, Luwuk, Balantak, Tinangkung, and Lamala subdistricts. 49 villages, or parts of villages.
